description: Two handprinted 32" sq. and four 12.5" x 10.25" retangles. Handprinted in Thailand. Cotton, chintz finish. Plain weave light brown with dark brown print.Lg.Repeated Pillow squares 32.5x33". Small pillow squarea along right edge 10.5x12.5. Sandalwood
